# 🇺🇸 Trump Intel — Feb 22, 2026 10:04 AM

## 🔴 CRITICAL ALERTS

### Congress to Vote on Blocking Iran Strike Authority
**Category:** Military | **Source:** Reuters  
U.S. Congress could vote as soon as next week on whether to block President Trump's ability to strike Iran without lawmakers' approval. U.S. military preparing for potential serious conflict with Iran if diplomatic efforts fail.

**Market Impact:** Defense stocks (LMT, RTX, NOC), oil futures (CL), Iran-exposed markets

---

### Supreme Court Overturns Emergency Tariffs
**Category:** Trade | **Source:** Reuters (Feb 20)  
U.S. Supreme Court ruled to overturn the White House's emergency tariffs. Thousands of businesses won hard-fought victory; refund process for affected businesses has just begun.

**Market Impact:** Import-heavy sectors (retail, manufacturing), trade-dependent stocks

---

## 🟠 IMPORTANT ALERTS

### Trump Attacks Supreme Court Justices
**Category:** Policy | **Source:** Reuters (Feb 21)  
Trump lashed out against justices in "remarkably personal terms," including two he appointed, calling them "very unpatriotic and disloyal to our Constitution."

**Market Impact:** Political uncertainty, institutional stability concerns

---

### Asylum Work Permits to Be Paused for Years
**Category:** Policy | **Source:** Reuters (Feb 20)  
Proposed rule published Friday would pause work permits for asylum applicants for 'many years' under Trump admin — one of the most sweeping changes to asylum-seeker employment authorization in decades.

**Market Impact:** Labor markets, agriculture, hospitality, construction

---

### Liberation Day Tariffs on Mexico, Canada, China
**Category:** Trade | **Source:** Fox News (April 2025)  
Trump unveiled historic tariffs at Rose Garden "Make America Wealthy Again" event, imposing tariffs on Mexico, Canada, China, and others to bring manufacturing jobs back to U.S.

**Market Impact:** Manufacturing, steel/aluminum, import/export sectors

---

## 🔵 INFO

### Trump Controls DJT (Truth Social Parent)
**Category:** Market | **Source:** CNBC  
Trump is controlling shareholder of Trump Media & Technology Group (DJT), operator of Truth Social social media app.

**Market Impact:** DJT stock, social media sector
